remarks: Operation closure of matrix multiplication.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Sep-2015.)  (Proof shortened by AV, 23-Jul-2019.)
statement:
mamucl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
mamucl.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) $.
mamucl.f $e |- F = ( R maMul <. M , N , P >. ) $.
mamucl.m $e |- ( ph -> M e. Fin ) $.
mamucl.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. Fin ) $.
mamucl.p $e |- ( ph -> P e. Fin ) $.
mamucl.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( B ^m ( M X. N ) ) ) $.
mamucl.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. ( B ^m ( N X. P ) ) ) $.
mamucl $p |- ( ph -> ( X F Y ) e. ( B ^m ( M X. P ) ) ) $.
